title: Once Upon a Scoundrel (Full Movie) Comedy

sources.title: Once Upon a Scoundrel (Full Movie) Comedy
sources.description:
Comic genius Zero Mostel hilariously portrays Senor Carlos de Refugio, a wealthy landowner known for his roguish and selfish acts.

Director: George Schaefer
Writer: Alford Van Ronkel (as Rip Van Ronkel)
Stars: Zero Mostel, Katy Jurado, A Martinez
1973
